title: Photo of Gustav Mahler by Moritz Nähr
description: Photograph of Gustav Mahler in the foyer of Vienna's opera house. This work was published on plate 12 of Richard Specht's Gustav Mahler (1913), Berlin and Leipzig: Schuster and Loeffler.
creator: Nähr, Moritz
subject: Gustav Mahler; photo

title: Mahler conducting caricature
description: Caricature drawings satirising the conducting style of Gustav Mahler when he was director of the Vienna State Opera, 1897-1907
creator: Schließmann, Hans
subject: Gustav Mahler; caricature

title: Gustav Mahler silhouette Otto Böhler
description: Gustav Mahler, Silhouette, Böhler, Otto (1914) Dr. Otto Böhler's Schattenbilder, Vienna: Wilhelm Lechner, pp. 20, III
creator: Böhler, Otto
subject: Gustave Mahler; caricature

title: Mahlercartoon 1907
description: A cartoon from the Austrian magazine Die Muskete, depicting the composer-conductor w:Gustav Mahler with a variety of musical and pseudo-musical devices. The translated caption reads: "My God, I've forgotten the motor-horn! Now I shall have to write another symphony."
creator: Schönpflug, Fritz
subject: Gustave Mahler; caricature

title: Zasche-Theo Gustav-Mahler-1906
description: Zasche's drawing for the cartoon, first published in Illustrated Vienna Special Edition November 25, 1900.
creator: Zasche, Theo
subject: Gustave Mahler; caricature
